name: Pay for Veggie
description:
In Pay For Veggie you are the owner of a small farm, your goal is to achieve what evryone else didn't! You will start with a couple of seeds a plow and a scythe, plant and expand your farm as much as possible to finish all the task in shortes time possible! 

Once you complete all the achievement you can consider yourself a real farmer! Live outiside can be better than we think nowadays!

Your main task in these game will be:

  • Plow the farm
  • Plant the crops investing money
  • Manage the crops you want to plant based on time and cost
  • Harvest all your products to get richer and plant MORE!
Controls

I controls sono tutti raggiungibile via mouse


Plow:  you can pow your farm, prepering it to seed. Scythe: you can harvest all your crops. 

Seed: select the seed tool to plant the active seed in your farm, to change the seed open the corresponding menu.
